title: Page 14
content:
So good Mother Snowbank 

 Up there in the sky, 

 Just drew in her breath 

 With a long drawn sigh- 

 Then, she suddenly tore 

 A small cloud in two, 

 And in the queer fashion 

 That some people do, 

 She made her a night cap 

 To put on her head, 

 Then shook up her pillows 

 And went off to bed.

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
